pages.text: Sodium is a coolant for the fission reactor.  it has a higher heat capacity than water and is needed for larger and/or more active reactors.
It is produced by splitting $(l:chemicals/gaseous_brine)Brine$(/l) into Sodium and $(l:chemicals/chlorine)Chlorine$(/l) in an $(l:block/electrolytic_separator)Electrolytic Seperator$(/l)
